verbose_text: To determine whether the ability of XRCC1-BRCT1 to bind DNA plays a role in its function as a DNA repair scaffold, we employed U2OS cells in which the XRCC1 gene was disrupted by CRISPR / Cas9 mediated gene editing and XRCC1 expression then restored in the edited cells by transfection with wild-type or mutant EGFP XRCC1 fusion protein (see STAR Methods).
evidence: XRCC1 gene was disrupted by CRISPR/Cas9
